alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 19 at 2:25PM AKST until February 22 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches, are possible. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph could cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is also possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch for blizzard conditions means there is a potential for falling and/or blowing snow with strong winds and extremely poor visibilities. This can lead to whiteout conditions and make travel very difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
